The error is in the java.util.zip.Inflater.end() native method. Which VM do 
you use ?

Forgot to mention: 
 
java version "1.4.2-rc1" 
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build Blackdown-1.4.2-rc1) 
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build Blackdown-1.4.2-rc1, mixed mode)

Switching to this JVM resolved the problem: 
 
java version "1.5.0-beta2" 
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0-beta2-b51) 
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 1.5.0-beta2-b51, mixed mode)
Thanks. Closing as VM bug then.
